p: In Lang et al. study, the combined effects of essential oils of M. piperita, cinnamon and garlic on biofilm formation by Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PA01), were examined. Their results showed that adhesion and initiation of P. aeruginosa (PA01) biofilm production, was decreased. Oil was inhibited and at higher concentrations of these compounds completely removed the biofilm (Lang et al., 2016 â–¶). Results of this study on the effect of peppermint oil on inhibition of P. aeruginosa biofilm formation are consistent with the results of the present study.
